thread.title: Antony compton

author: Antony compton
title: Antony compton
text: This is probably the worst company I have ever had to deal with. I've been trying to close my account for weeks now. I just keep getting fobbed off with lies and rudeness. You can't get to speak to a person in the UK and customer service won't let me speak to a line manager. I'm sick and tired of dealing with them - Iclear my balance in full always and my balance is zero...how hard can it be to close the account ffs
